body:
Hello, this wont take long i promise...

I have been trying to edit my profile, yet when i click "Edit profile" (http://edit/), It will occur as an error... Any help? :/
body_tagged:

title: Editing my profile?....

replies.body: Weird, try using this one http://avicus.net/vsplesk101/edit
replies.body_tagged: Weird, try using this one http://avicus.net/vsplesk101/edit

replies.body: I've been hearing a lot of users are having this problem, the best solution is to access the old forums and edit your profile there. Here; http://old.avicus.net/forums/ :)) Sign in through there, and edit your profile! ^-^
replies.body_tagged: I've been hearing a lot of users are having this problem, the best solution is to access the old forums and edit your profile there. Here; http://old.avicus.net/forums/ :)) Sign in through there, and edit your profile! ^-^

replies.body: There's also a "problem" where pressing "enter" to create a new paragraph doesn't work. There was a forum thread that said you could use an HTML tag but I forgot it. Does anyone know what it is and how to use it?
replies.body_tagged: There's also a "problem" where pressing "enter" to create a new paragraph doesn't work. There was a forum thread that said you could use an HTML tag but I forgot it. Does anyone know what it is and how to use it?
